Reviews.Title: Awesome computer
Reviews.Author: Orlyn H. Wingert
Reviews.Content: Good computer.  I like the number keyboard on the left and the large screen.  I was surprised that it did not come with excel however.  I like the long lasting battery as well.  I would also recommend getting malware and virus protection on the computer from the get go.

Reviews.Title: Got a lemon
Reviews.Author: Tammy Hamilton
Reviews.Content: The mother board was bad when I received it.  I have had good luck with Dells but really hate it that customer support is so hard to understand due to their accent.  A product is only as good as their support department.  Maybe Dell should rethink this.

Reviews.Title: Love the 17" screen
Reviews.Author: Vic
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with this laptop.  Had been looking for a laptop with 17" screen that also had large hard drive for a good price.  This one fit the bill.

Reviews.Title: Built-in mouse sticking
Reviews.Author: Tom Niedererr
Reviews.Content: I have a small problem with the built-in mouse sticking at times. Hooked up an external mouse to eliminate this. may just be wear-in time. Will keep testing. Mostly happens when playing games.Otherwise, still getting used to windows 8,but not having troubles like some reviews I've read.

Reviews.Title: Worst operating system ever!
Reviews.Author: P. Roberts "penroberts"
Reviews.Content: This is by far the worst computer I have ever owned! Windows 8 operating system is a nightmare...continual popups, everything is hard to find...can't even watch a movie...The computer is so messed up it won't even let me access the Dell service/help information center. It arrived this way out of the box...I thought it had a virus, still not sure it doesn't! Very disappointed customer...would give it 0 stars if I could.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!!
Reviews.Author: Melissa D. Shupe
Reviews.Content: Love my new computer. Still learning the Windows 8, but otherwise it's perfect! I would recommend this computer. Dell computers are great.

Reviews.Title: Great computer, crappy packaging
Reviews.Author: Don Means
Reviews.Content: It does everything it should do.  My complaint would not be about my Dell.  It is of the same high quality I have been use to over the years.  The company I bought from is another thing though.  The delivery was a little slow but that wasn't the big complaint but it was the shipping container.  The end was mostly torn away from the box when I received it.  Even the FedEx guy commented on it.  Dell's superior packaging of the internal box saved the day though. It was like they didn't have a real box so they tried to put one together from cardboard scraps.  The computer survived though and I love it.

Reviews.Title: Dell doesn't know about this system
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Angelastro
Reviews.Content: Dell does not know about this system. Didn't know that this would be the case. That should have been clear.
